channel.title: Do Need To PortFoward if wireless?
channel.description: Im wondering if you have a wireless connection do you have to portforward?

item.title: Do Need To PortFoward if wireless?
item.dc:creator: @_A-M #A-M
item.description:
@_A-M wrote:

[quote=“joejoe pker, post:1, topic:120741”]Im wondering if you have a wireless connection do you have to portforward?[/quote] If you use DYNAMIC IP i wouldnt suggest doing it… cuz it changes ip after what position you log into…
anyways, go www.routerlogin.com enter ur admin stuff… look for PortForwarding go into it and fill out the stuff, the ip it asks for is the Intern-Ip of ur internet should look like this or something LIKE IT 195.155.03.1… and if u are like 6 ppl on ur net u would have to forward 6 ips, for example : 182.155.03.1 u would have to forward :
182.155.03.1
182.155.03.2
182.155.03.3
182.155.03.4
182.155.03.5
Etc… Hope That Helped

Read full topic
item.source: Do Need To PortFoward if wireless?
